00042         private $options = array();

00051         public function getOption($option) {
00052                 return isset($this->options[$option]) ? $this->options[$option] : false;
00053         }
00054 
00063         public function putOption($option, $value) {
00064                 if(!is_string($option) || !is_string($value)) {
00065                         return false;
00066                 } $this->options[$option] = $value;
00067                 return true;
00068         }

00080         public function insertPlugin($name, $filename) {
00081                 return $this->updateFromFile($filename, "plugin_$name");
00082         }

00093         public function updateFromFile($filename, $name = '') {
00094                 // Check the filename and return if already exists AND
00095                 // is not a normal file.
00096                 if(file_exists($filename) && !is_file($filename)) {
00097                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'MAIN_Config::updateFromFile', "$filename does not exist.");
00098                 } $options = parse_ini_file($filename, true);
00099 
00100                 // Check if the file failed to open,
00101                 // then check if it is writable.
00102                 if($options === false) {
00103                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'MAIN_Config::updateFromFile', "$filename failed to open.");
00104                 } elseif($name == '') {
00105                         $this->options = $options;
00106                 } else {
00107                         $this->options[$name] = $options;
00108                 } return true;
00109         }
00110 
00118         public function updateToFile($filename) {
00119                 // Check the filename and return if already exists AND
00120                 // is not a normal file.
00121                 $filename = realpath($filename);
00122                 if(file_exists($filename) && !is_file($filename)) {
00123                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'MAIN_Config::updateToFile', "$filename does not exist.");
00124                 } $file = fopen($filename, 'w');
00125 
00126                 // Check if the file failed to open,
00127                 // then check if it is writable.
00128                 if($file === false) {
00129                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'MAIN_Config::updateToFile', "$filename failed to open.");
00130                 } elseif(!is_writable($filename)) {
00131                         fclose($file);
00132                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, 'MAIN_Config::updateToFile', "$filename is not writeable.");
00133                 }
00134 
00135                 $lines = array();
00136                 foreach($this->options as $key => $value) {
00137                         if(strpos($key, 'plugin_')) {
00138                                 continue;
00139                         } elseif(is_array($value)) {
00140                                 $lines[] = "\n[$key]";
00141                                 foreach($value as $curkey => $curval) {
00142                                         $lines[] = "$curkey = $curval";
00143                                 }
00144                         } else {
00145                                 $lines[] = "$key = $value";
00146                         }
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 // Append the options to the file and close.
00150                 $lines  = implode("\n", $lines);
00151                 $retval = fwrite($file, $lines);
00152                 fclose($file);
00153 
00154                 return $retval;
00155         }
00156 }
